name: centipede_damascus
text: Lie Bot sure does like to lie.

name: mortshire
text: i miss the stutter. :'(

name: ambala
text: Lie Bot doesn't really lie - he taps into the unseen truth.  Or something.

name: zefiel
text: Todd does get a plane. I propose [url="http://achewood.com/index.php?date=10302001"]that he's traveled to the future[/url] and seen everything that'll happen.

name: zefiel
text: dang, click here.

name: connellingus
text: That's actually a really cool theory. It would also explain how Lie Bot knows the date of Téodor's death .

name: willt
text: But wait.... Teodor's still alive.

name: hateandwar
text: Someone wasn't paying attention.

name: jhunter
text:
lie bot always tells the truth
backwards

name: huber
text: TODD SHIRT!

name: m3funkyb
text: liebot is cruel...

name: a_dude
text: like so many of my own prayers.

name: cicadalek
text: Dosen't Todd end up running a chartered airplane? Maybe it wasn't a lie at all...

name: jaiden
text:
Lie Bot also accurately predicts Teodor's "death" with the whole bottle-cap-in-the-throat thing.

Creepy psychic robot, or creepy robot that's good with lucky guesses?

name: zefiel
text: Time traveling Robot.

name: lux
text: conveniently omniscient plot-device character to advance Onstad's canon, actually

name: antsama
text: Again with Todd showing off a certain childish trait in these early years.  Then he gets heavy with the smack and gets hardcore!

name: tetrisattack
text: This is the best Todd on Lie Bot action

name: zefiel
text: Hopefully the ONLY Todd on Lie Bot action we'll ever see. Thankfully Achewood doesn't seem to interest the slash fic writers out there.

name: semiquaver
text: Well, the characters aren't exactly slabs of beefcake.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Pun connecting the word "Beefcake" to the fictional character name "Roast Beef" not found.

Internet celebrates.

name: sparhawk
text:
Lie Bot does not have a dang.

Though it should be reflected that Beef's is intermittently invisible (cold weather?).

name: spectre
text: Yeah, Todd eventually gets the plane and Lie Bot knew the date of Teodor's death, but he still LIES -- the uncle is STILL DEAD. Knowing the future just enables you to LIE MORE EFFECTIVELY.

name: afronaut
text:
Haha!

Hahahaha!

name: melmaysmuckles
text: how did the robot know the squirrel wanted an aeroplane?

name: tekende
text: Because everyone wants an aeroplane.

name: especial
text: Not Anthony Kiedis. He already has an aeroplane.

name: deusoma
text: Aw Lie Bot, you so crazy. Crazy jerk more like.

name: hcaz
text: Harsh, Lie Bot, harsh.

name: drskradley
text: Todd has a tragic history!

name: hellofditties
text: There should be more interactions between Lie Bot and Todd.  This is great.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Todd just really doesn't have good luck with the longevity of his relatives, does he?

name: atilla
text: He's a squirrel, what did you expect?

name: aristagoras
text: Lie Bot can read anyone like a teleprompter.

name: dovey
text: Todd has a rough time in the early strips. You can understand why he'd turn to drugs.

name: idsyen
text: Lie Bot is very good at reading people. Hats off to his creators for making a very effective lying robot. He even mixes his lies with the truth!

name: em2
text: Poor, poor, Todd. He will never learn, and that's why we love him.

name: doubleclef
text: I think it's funny that the first two appearances of Todd have him mourning the death of a relative.  I really can connect with that

name: nicejames
text: Man, I don't get how he always knows the best lie to tell.  I want that program in MY brain.

name: zapatos
text: I like how Todd actually has an airplane.

name: skavid
text: I love how Lie Bot makes fun of Todd in the first panel.

name: bit_malik
text: LB tells the best lies. He tells people what they want to hear.

name: puguglypress
text: This one is funny cuz it's about how the poor and uneducated try to solve their problems through prayer!

name: puguglypress
text: Oh come on that was a good one
